eyebrows.title: Shaping of Eyebrows
description: Eyebrow shaping can be done by waxing or threading technique to remove hair around the eyebrows and shape them to the face. Eyebrow tinting can be done to add a tint to the eyebrow to enhance the color of the eyebrows.Â  Eyebrow shaping, tinting, waxing or threading will emphasize your eyes, and enhance your facial features.

facials.title: Facials and Skin Care
description: Facials are a luxurious and relaxing way to care for your skin. Our estheticians will customize a facial to suit your individual needs, whether that's addressing specific skin concerns like acne or aging, or simply indulging in some well-deserved pampering.

waxing.title: Body Waxing
description: Waxing is a quick and effective way to remove unwanted hair from the face and body. Our estheticians use high-quality wax and techniques to ensure minimal discomfort and maximum results, leaving you with smooth, hair-free skin for weeks.
info: It's recommended to exfoliate the area before the appointment and to avoid any kind of physical activity that may cause irritation after the service.

other.title: Extended Services
description: We also provide other cutting edge services that are great for everything from skin care to hair removal. Choose from one of our offerings or speak to our experts for a more personalized experience.
